ygData.msgSnippet: Suukie suddenly flew to his feet, almost dead, he brutally beats Sinister down and then targets Sinesis. Suukie grabs them both by the necks in his big hand

From: "THECODE" <thecode@...>

Suukie suddenly flew to his feet, almost dead, he brutally beats Sinister
down and then targets Sinesis. Suukie grabs them both by the necks in his
big hand and slams them into a tree. Suukie looked very psychotic. Sinesis
and Sinister knew a new trick, though. Sinesis and Sinister's weapons
combined and then split in half, making a half sword and half axe in each of
their hands. Suukie choked them both until they couldn't breath. Suukie
laughed as they ran out of air. Lightmare stepped into the scene. Lightmare
transformed and fired into the back of Suukie, dropping him to his knees.
Blades popped out of the forearms of Sinesis and Sinister and they combined
with their already devastating weapons. Theior weaponss complete, Sinesis
and Sinister lunged at Suukie, stabbing their blades through him and pinning
him to a tree. Suukie stared straight ahead, seeing flashes of the future
again. Suukie's spark got weaker, and he lost gallons of mech fuid...

Plintissa senses something was wrong and started to run. She ran from the
Maximal base and ran over the hills toward the Pred base. She should have
known not to let Suukie do what he wanted and fight this battle alone, but
he threatened to kill her and she was already on the side of his choking
before. Dracona yelled for Plintissa to wait but it was no use. Plintissa
arived and seen the grim Suukie. Sinesis and Sinister were nowhere in sight,
but Plintissa seen some of their mech fluid and their footprints, after
their betrayal she knew they did this. Plintissa looked up onto a rock above
and saw Lightmare looking down at her in her horse mode. Lightmare ran off
as Plintissa fired at her. Plintissa helped Suukie to the ground, he wasn't
pinned to the tree anymore because Sinesis and Sinister took their weapons.
Plintissa drug Suukie out and away from the Pred base and layed him in the
field.

"Suukie...Does not exist. I love you." Was all Suukie said. Plintissa had
some med packs from dracona's lab, but they were doing little good on a bot
this brutalized...
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
